front.title: IPv6 Encapsulation for SFC and IFIT

abstract.t: Service Function Chaining (SFC) and In-situ Flow Information Telemetry (IFIT) are important path services along with the packets. In order to support these services, several encapsulations have been defined. The document analyzes the problems of these encapsulations in the IPv6 scenario and proposes the possible optimized encapsulation for IPv6.
